Package com.tinmegali.security.mcipher

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MDecryptor
    Decryption interface that facilitates the decryption process.
    MEncryptor
    Encryption interface that facilitates the encryption process.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MCipherConstants
    Holds constant values used by the encryption/decryption process by the MEncryptorDefault and MDecryptorDefault classes.
    MCipherUtils
    Utility class with static helper methods to encryption/decryption operations.
    MDecryptorBuilder
    MDecryptor builder.
    MDecryptorDefault
    Decrypts data using Android's native libraries.
    MEncryptorBuilder
    MEncryptor builder.
    MEncryptorDefault
    Encrypt data using native Android libraries.
    MKeyWrapper
    Utility class to handle the encryption/decryption and the storage/load of keys used in encryption and decryption operation for large chunks of data in SDK previous to 23.
